content: Anyone know if there is a mechanism to provide feedback on NHS Digital's PDSAPI project?
You could use https://nhs-digital-api-management.featureupvote.com/ if you have suggestions, otherwise an email directly to their product owner at api.management@nhs.net
Have deposited R4 Patient $match on the upvote ...
Can't see it yet - will have to get past the vetting process before it's visible :-)
